Xml

type
class
The standard Xml class and parsing. More API to manipulate XML are available in the haxe.xml package.

Static Variables

public CData(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

public Comment(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

public DocType(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

public Document(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

public Element(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

public PCData(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

public Prolog(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

Static Methods

private compare(a : Xml, b : Xml) : Bool

public createCData(data : String) : Xml

Creates a node of the given type.

public createComment(data : String) : Xml

Creates a node of the given type.

public createDocType(data : String) : Xml

Creates a node of the given type.

public createDocument() : Xml

Creates a node of the given type.

public createElement(name : String) : Xml

Creates a node of the given type.

public createPCData(data : String) : Xml

Creates a node of the given type.

public createProlog(data : String) : Xml

Creates a node of the given type.

private getNodeType(node : flash.xml.XML) : XmlType

public parse(str : String) : Xml

Parse a String into an Xml object.

private wrap(node : flash.xml.XML, ?type : XmlType) : Xml

Constructor

private new()

Instance Variables

private _node : flash.xml.XML

public nodeName(getNodeName,setNodeName) : String

Returns the node name of an Element.

public nodeType(default,null) : XmlType

Returns the type of the Xml Node. This should be used before accessing other functions since some might raise an exception if the node type is not correct.

public nodeValue(getNodeValue,setNodeValue) : String

Returns the node value. Only works if the Xml node is not an Element or a Document.

public parent(getParent,null) : Xml

Returns the parent object in the Xml hierarchy. The parent can be null, an Element or a Document.

Instance Methods

public addChild(x : Xml) : Void

Adds a child node to the Document or Element. One node can only be inside one given node which is indicated by the parent property.

public attributes() : Iterator<String>

Returns an Iterator on all the attribute names.

public elements() : Iterator<Xml>

Returns an iterator of all child nodes which are Elements. Only works if the current node is an Element or a Document.

public elementsNamed(name : String) : Iterator<Xml>

Returns an iterator of all child nodes which are Elements with the given nodeName. Only works if the current node is an Element or a Document.

public exists(att : String) : Bool

Tells if the Element node has a given attribute. Attributes are case-sensitive.

public firstChild() : Xml

Returns the first child node.

public firstElement() : Xml

Returns the first child node which is an Element.

public get(att : String) : String

Get the given attribute of an Element node. Returns null if not found. Attributes are case-sensitive.

private getAttribNS(cur : flash.xml.XML, ns : Array<String>) : flash.xml.XMLList

private getNodeName() : String

private getNodeValue() : String

private getParent() : Xml

public insertChild(x : Xml, pos : Int) : Void

Inserts a child at the given position among the other childs.

public iterator() : Iterator<Xml>

Returns an iterator of all child nodes. Only works if the current node is an Element or a Document.

public remove(att : String) : Void

Removes an attribute for an Element node. Attributes are case-sensitive.

public removeChild(x : Xml) : Bool

Removes a child from the Document or Element. Returns true if the child was successfuly removed.

public set(att : String, value : String) : Void

Set the given attribute value for an Element node. Attributes are case-sensitive.

private setNodeName(n : String) : String

private setNodeValue(v : String) : String

public toString() : String

Returns a String representation of the Xml node.

private wraps(xList : flash.xml.XMLList) : Array<Xml>
